content: Embed a room selector to allow users to access any room from the list of the available ones.

comment.text: The "RoomSelectorDescription" translation key provides a brief description to be used when displaying an image and title for a room selector button in the Portal Settings page. The text is meant to describe the purpose of this feature: allowing users to access any room from a list of available ones.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation deviates significantly from the intended meaning of the English content. The English text refers to a 'room selector' allowing access to available rooms. The Arabic translation mentions 'a public room' and accessing 'documents stored there without registration'. This changes the functionality described.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتضمين منتقي غرف للسماح للمستخدمين بالوصول إلى أي غرفة من قائمة الغرف المتاحة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'المستندات' (documents) isn't present or implied in the original English content. This addition introduces extraneous information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the reference to 'documents' (المستندات) from the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'بدون تسجيل' (without registration) is not directly related to the functionality described in the English text. The English content does not mention registration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the phrase 'بدون تسجيل' (without registration) from the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'otaqlar' should likely be 'oataqlar' to be consistent with common usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçilərə mövcud oataqlar siyahısından istənilən otağa daxil olmaq üçün otaq seçicisi əlavə edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to allow users to have access" is redundant.  'To allow users access' is more concise and natural in Bulgarian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вградете селектор на стая, за да позволите на потребителите да имат достъп до всяка стая от списъка с наличните. -> Вградете селектор на стая, за да позволите на потребителите да имат достъп до всяка стая от наличните.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vložení selektoru místností...' literally translates to "Insertion of a room selector..." which is not as natural as a phrase like "Implementujte selektor místností..." or "Zobrazte selektor místností...". It feels clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Implementujte selektor místností, který uživatelům umožní přístup k libovolné místnosti ze seznamu dostupných místností.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using a more active phrasing would improve readability and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Implementujte selektor místností, aby uživatelé mohli přistupovat k libovolné místnosti ze seznamu dostupných místností.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Betten Sie eine Raumauswahl ein' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Embed a room selector'. It literally translates to 'Bede a room selection' which isn't the intended meaning.  'Einbetten' or 'Integrieren' would be better alternatives.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrieren Sie eine Raumauswahl, um Benutzern den Zugriff auf jeden Raum aus der Liste der verfügbaren Räume zu ermöglichen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Embed a room selector' is a bit ambiguous. 'Incruste' (embed) might imply a more forceful integration than intended. A more natural translation might be 'Añade' (add) or 'Incluye' (include).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Añade un selector de salas para permitir a los usuarios acceder a cualquier sala de la lista de salas disponibles.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and somewhat awkward. 'Päästä mihin tahansa saatavilla olevien huoneiden listalla olevaan huoneeseen' is clunky. It doesn't read naturally in Finnish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Salli käyttäjien valita huone saatavilla olevien huoneiden listasta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly wrong, the use of 'huoneeseen' at the end is a bit repetitive given the repeated use of 'huone'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid repeating 'huone' so much.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Տեղադրեք սենյակի ընտրիչը, որպեսզի օգտվողները կարողանան մուտք գործել ցանկացած սենյակ հասանելիների ցանկից:" is a bit literal and could be more natural-sounding. 'հասանելիների ցանկից' translates to 'list of available ones', but in Armenian, a more common phrasing would be something like 'պահվողների ցանկից' or 'պԱրՀակային ցանկից'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Տեղադրեք սենյակի ընտրիչը, որպեսզի օգտվողները կարողանան մուտք գործել ցանկացած սենյակ պահվողների ցանկից:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "임베드하세요" (imbedhaseyo) is a direct transliteration of 'embed'. While understandable, it's not the most natural way to express this concept in Korean. A more natural phrasing would be something like "방 선택 도구를 포함하세요" (bang seon-taek dou-geul pohamhaseyo) or "방 선택 기능을 추가하세요" (bang seon-taek gineung-eul chugahaseyo).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 방 선택 도구를 포함하세요 (bang seon-taek dou-geul pohamhaseyo) or 방 선택 기능을 추가하세요 (bang seon-taek gineung-eul chugahaseyo)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "모든 방에 액세스할 수 있도록" (modeun bang-e accesshal su itdorok) is grammatically correct but slightly stiff. A more fluent way to express this is '모든 방에 접근할 수 있게' (modeun bang-e jeopgeunhal su itge).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 모든 방에 접근할 수 있게 (modeun bang-e jeopgeunhal su itge)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'pieejamo failu saraksta' (list of available files) doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase 'list of the available ones' (rooms). It should refer to 'telpu saraksta' (list of rooms).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ieguliet telpu atlasītāju, lai ļautu lietotājiem piekļūt jebkurai telpai no pieejamo telpu saraksta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Embed' is not perfectly captured by 'Integreer'. 'Integreer' implies a deeper integration than simply displaying a selector. A better translation might be 'Voeg toe' or 'Plaats'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voeg een kamer selectie toe zodat gebruikers...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to allow users to access' is somewhat awkwardly translated as 'zodat gebruikers een willekeurige kamer... kunnen openen'. While technically correct, it could be more fluent. 'Toegang krijgen tot' would be a more natural translation of 'access'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zodat gebruikers toegang kunnen krijgen tot een willekeurige kamer...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Embed' is translated as 'Incorporează'. While technically correct, 'Incorporează' can sound a bit formal and less natural in this context. A more common and user-friendly translation would be 'Adaugă' or 'Include'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adaugă selector de sală pentru a permite utilizatorilor să acceseze orice sală din lista sălilor disponibile.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "පවතින ලැයිස්තුවෙන් ඕනෑම කාමරයකට ප්‍රවේශයට පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ඉඩ දීමට කාමර තෝරනයක් කාවද්දන්න" is a bit awkward and doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. The phrasing 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ඉඩ දීමට' (to allow users) is overly formal and clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පවතින කාමර ලැයිස්තුවෙන් ඕනෑම කාමරයකට පරිශ්‍රමකයින්ට යාමට හැකිවන පරිදි කාමර තෝරනයක් ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'කාවද්දන්න' (kāvaddaṇna) which means 'to keep' or 'to have' isn't quite right in this context. It implies holding something, not embedding or including.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඇතුළත් කරන්න (Athulath karanna) which means 'to include' or 'to embed' would be a more accurate choice.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English phrase 'Embed a room selector' is best conveyed by something that implies inclusion, rather than 'to allow access'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The suggestion above incorporates a more appropriate verb.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vdelajte izbirnik sobe, da uporabnikom omogočite dostop do katere koli sobe s seznama razpoložljivih." is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Slovenian. 's seznama razpoložljivih' implies a list of available rooms as a specific list, whereas the English implies a general selection of available rooms. The word 'vdelajte' can also be improved for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrirajte izbirnik sobe, da uporabnikom omogočite dostop do katere koli razpoložljive sobe.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'уградите' (ugradite) translates to 'install' or 'embed' in a technical sense, but in this context, a more appropriate word would convey the idea of 'providing' or 'including'. It implies a physical installation, which isn't intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Обезбедите селектор собе да бисте корисницима омогуц́или приступ било којој просторији са листе доступних.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'просторији' is spelled correctly, but might be misinterpreted as 'room' in a colloquial sense. Using 'соби' is more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Обезбедите селектор собе да бисте корисницима омогуц́или приступ било којој соби са листе доступних.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ugradite selektor sobe da biste korisnicima omogućili pristup bilo kojoj prostoriji sa liste dostupnih.' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Serbian. 'Ugradite' (embed) feels awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would focus on providing a room selection option.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogućite korisnicima da biraju iz liste dostupnih soba.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'prostoriji' contains a typo. It should be 'prostorija'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: prostorija

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a slightly formal tone for user-facing documentation. Consider softening it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcıların mevcut odalar arasından istedikleri odaya erişebilmeleri için bir oda seçici ekleyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "嵌入房间选择器，让用户能够访问允许列表中的房间" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Embed a room selector to allow users to access any room from the list of the available ones." Specifically, '允许列表' (allowed list) implies a restriction. The original text suggests access to *all* available rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 嵌入房间选择器，方便用户访问可用房间列表。
